article.title: A two-dimensional hexagonal sheet of TiO$_2$

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the shape of the pores formed in the HNS structure?
According to Table 1, what is the z-coordinate of the O2 atom in the HNS structure?
Which structure listed in Table 2 has the highest dissociation energy with respect to anatase?
According to Figure 2(b), what type of strain leads to an increase in the band gap energy of the HNS?
What happens to the band gap of HNS when an oxygen vacancy is introduced, as shown in Figure 3?
choices: The band gap remains largely unchanged.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the absence of imaginary modes in the phonon band structure of HNS in Figure 4 indicate?
choices: The structure has a high dielectric constant.

multiple_choice_question.text: Based on the COHP analysis in Figure 5, which molecule shows the strongest interaction with the HNS?
